price: 49. En jullie zullen de misdadigers zien, aan elkaar vastgebonden met ketenen.
arabic: وَتَرَى ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ مُّقَرَّنِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَصۡفَادِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: watarā al-muj'rimīna yawma-idhin muqarranīna fī al-aṣfādi
